description: Northern Lion Gold Corp., a mineral exploration company, focuses on acquiring, exploring, and developing gold-bearing mineral resource properties in Canada. It has an option to acquire an undivided 100% interest in the Riverside property, consisting of three non-surveyed contiguous mineral claims covering an area of 491.60 hectares located in Kamloops, British Columbia. The company was incorporated in 1980 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
